thread.title: Aman Verma: 'Bigg Boss 9' will be my major comeback
thread.title_full: Aman Verma: 'Bigg Boss 9' will be my major comeback - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Aman Verma: 'Bigg Boss 9' will be my major comeback
text:
Actor Aman Verma is confident that celebrity reality show ' Bigg Boss Nau' will be a game changer in his career.*Aman Verma*
The 43-year-old 'Kyunki Saas Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi' actor, who was the target of a sting operation, said he is taking up this project as his major comeback on the small screen.
"I feel 'Bigg Boss' is a ... Â»
